citeinfo.origin: Fisheries and Oceans Canada - Ocean Science And Productivity, Pacific
citeinfo.title: Knight Inlet Acoustic Doppler Current Profiler data, 1995

descript.abstract: Acoustic doppler current profiler data, current meter data, thermistor chain data of Knight Inlet in 1995. Sill area in particular, time-series data, yo-yo CTD data.
descript.purpose: Constructing models of circulation in Knight Inlet
descript.supplinf: Risk Justification: Data not secured in regional data centre . Risk of Loss: Medium Impact Justification: Data used for one time analysis. Impact of Loss: Low Recommended Action: Bring data to archives.

place.placekey: South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)

idinfo.useconst: Collaborative research with Office of Naval Research (U.S.); some may still be proprietary

cntaddr.address: Institute of Ocean Sciences, P.O. Box 6000, 9860 West Saanich Road

dataqual.complete: Dataset Complications: Much of this data set is experimental data.

stdorder.nondig: Hardcopy Original Exists: Y Hardcopy Locations: Grace Kamitakahara-King, IOS Hardcopy Description: Echo sounder print outs during cruise.

digtinfo.formname: 9-track tapes (acoustic data); ASCII/ header format (CTD data)
digtinfo.formcont: IOS Header and IOSLIB libraries (CTD data).

stdorder.ordering: Electronic Data Doc Locations: Header information in each file and additional processing notes in data directory (CTD data)
